import React from 'react' import img1 from '../../images/img1.jpg'; import '../style.css'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Header from '../Header'; import { Form, Row , Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const EditDetails: FC<{}> = (props) => { const { state } = useLocation(); const [name, setName] = useState(state.name); const [desc, setDesc] = useState(state.desc); const [loc, setLoc] = useState(state.location); const [category, setCategory] = useState(state.category); const [picture, setPicture] = useState([]); return (

Update Item

Item Name setName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter Item Name" defaultValue={state.name} /> Category setCategory(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter category" defaultValue={state.category} /> Description setDesc(e.target.value)} placeholder="Describe about the item" defaultValue={state.desc} /> Location Image
) } export default EditDetails
